comment: The induction step for a vertex degree calculation, for example in the Königsberg graph. If the degree of ` U ` in the edge set ` E ` is ` P ` , then adding ` { X , U } ` to the edge set, where ` X =/= U ` , yields degree ` P + 1 ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2016.) (Revised by AV, 3-Mar-2021.)
